name: Slappy
description:
Slappy

Move around by slapping! Find all the secret balloons and pop them. Get past spinning obstacles and watch out for deadly surfaces.

Browser version: https://krasgo.itch.io/slappy-webgl?secret=p3v4PRdrmLKJ4AzXf598jI7ryI

Music:

Street Meat - Good Eats by Dean Scarlett https://deanscarlett.bandcamp.com/album/good-eats
